post.body: To those trying to get ZeroNet working with latest Tor browser, where the option for no proxies is disabled by default, here is how you fix this: first, edit your torrc according to https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/ZeroNet. Then in about:config, set network.proxy.no_proxies_on to "127.0.0.1" and ZeroNet should work with Tor browser (I struggled with this for a little bit, thought it might help others). Also, first real post on ZeroMe, hello all!
